author: Source: KCCI-TV Des Moines
title: The hoverboard Tony Hawk helped design - KCCI-TV Des Moines
text:
The DeLorean might still be some way off, but in the present hoverboard technology is cruising along nicely -- and its flagship model just got an upgrade. Hendo 2.0, the updated version of the hoverboard that caught everyone's attention exactly one year ago, has just been released, and it's quite something.
 KCCI-TV Des Moines.
